p: Essential oils are volatile compounds extracted from the leaves, flowers, fruits, stalks, roots, and resins of plants and are widely used in aromatherapy, perfumes, cosmetics, and the food industry [ 4]. The pomelo is a large fruit of the genus Citrus. Citrus essential oil is one of the most widely used essential oils because of its characteristic fresh sweet scent. Lemon ( Citrus limon), orange ( Citrus sinensis), and bergamot ( Citrus aurantium) have been commonly applied in aromatherapy to relieve stress, anxiety, and depression [ 5, 6]. In a pentobarbital sleeping-time model of Swiss male mice, Citrus aurantium could reduce insomnia [ 7].
